text: @FoxNews President Trump, are you aware that you were correct about UV-light therapy helping to treat coronavirus? Cedars-Sinai hospital in Los Angeles along with Aytu Bioscience are developing a device called Healight, which can kill coronavirus with the use of UV-A light therapy?
